}}px; overflow: hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .image-with-text-slider-{{ section.id }}.swiper { overflow: visible; } .image-with-text-slide-{{ section.id }} { display: grid !important; grid-template-columns: 1fr !important; grid-template-areas: "assets" "content" !important; overflow: hidden !important; border-radius: {{ slide_radius }}px !important; align-items: center !important; background-image: {{ slide_content_bg_gradient }}; background-color: {{ slide_content_bg_color }}; } .image-with-text-content-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px; text-align: {{ slide_content_align_mobile }}; grid-area: content; } .image-with-text-image-{{ section.id }} { aspect-ratio:1 /1; grid-area: assets; } .image-with-text-image-{{ section.id }} img, .image-with-text-image-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; margin: 0; } .image-with-text-image-{{ section.id }} svg { background-color: #ababab; } .image-with-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} { display: block; word-wrap: break-word; } .image-with-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ sub_heading_color }}; line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .image-with-text-heading-{{ section.id }} { display: block; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: {{ heading_mt_mobile }}px; } .image-with-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .image-with-text-text-{{ section.id }} { display: block; word-wrap: break-word; margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px; } .image-with-text-text-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ text_color }}; line-height: {{ text_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; border: 0px; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }}; border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px; background: transparent; background: {{ arrow_bg_color }}; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; cursor: pointer; -webkit-appearance: none; position: absolute; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); z-index: 2; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} { left: 32px; } .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { right: 32px; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .icon { pointer-events: none; place-items: center; display: grid; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon:before, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .icon:before { content: ""; grid-area: 1 / -1; transition: all .2s ease; width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg)); box-sizing: border-box; border-style: solid; border: 0px; border-right: 2px solid currentColor; border-top: 2px solid currentColor; position: relative; left: -1px; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon:before { left: unset; right: -1px; border-right: 0px; border-top: 0px; border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor; border-left: 2px solid currentColor; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon:after, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .icon:after { content: ""; grid-area: 1 / -1; transition: all .2s ease; width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px; height: 1.6px; transform-origin: center; opacity: 0; background: currentColor; transform: scaleX(.5); } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span { color: {{ arrow_color }}; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0; } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .image-with-text-slide-{{ section.id }} { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr !important; grid-template-areas: "content assets" !important; } .image-with-text-content-{{ section.id }} { padding: {{ slide_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_padding_horizontal }}px; text-align: {{ slide_content_align }}; } .image-with-text-subheading-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px; } .image-with-text-heading-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px; } .image-with-text-heading-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ heading_size }}px; } .image-with-text-text-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px; } .image-with-text-text-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ text_size }}px; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { width: {{ arrow_size }}px; height: {{ arrow_size }}px; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon:before, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .icon:before { width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px; height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .icon:after, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .icon:after { width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover { transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }}; background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }}; } .image-with-text-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .icon, .image-with-text-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .icon { color: {{ arrow_hover_color }}; } } {%- endstyle -%} {% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %} {% elsif image_ratio_mobile ==
